name: Minimalist Horror Story
description:
Escape from the house, but beware of the horror that haunts its halls!

Our entry for the Ludum Dare 26 game jam... we got 7th place for atmosphere and had a great time!

WASD to move, mouse to look LMB to interact, RMB to use candle.

For some reason, this got quite popular with youtubers - it's free and has pretty scary bits, i suppose.
